What is the meaning of having resistance?
This is the meaning indicated by the term falling into one's own body.
What is the meaning of not grasped?
This is what is revealed by the additional term, not the dharmas that fall into one's own body.

This is what is revealed by the additional term, the contaminated dharmas.

This is what is revealed by the additional term, the uncontaminated dharmas.

translated: The eye faculty, ear faculty, nose faculty, tongue faculty, body faculty, female faculty, male faculty, life faculty, mind faculty, faculty of pleasure, faculty of pain, faculty of joy, faculty of depression, faculty of equanimity, faculty of faith, faculty of zeal, faculty of mindfulness, faculty of concentration, faculty of wisdom, faculty of the power to know the unknown, faculty of the power to know, and faculty of the power to know completely.
Among these twenty-two faculties, how many are learners?
How many are neither learners nor post-learners?
Two are learners, one is a post-learner, and ten are neither learners nor post-learners.
It is either a learner, or a post-learner, or neither a learner nor a post-learner.
It is the mind faculty associated with the attention of a learner.
It is the mind faculty associated with the attention of a post-learner.
What is neither a learner nor a post-learner?
It is the mind faculty associated with the attention of one with impurities.
